mapper.insert: insert into post (title, content, hit, board_id, member_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{hit}, #{board.boardId}, #{member.memberId})
mapper.select: select p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.hit, p.board_id, m.member_id, m.nickname from post p inner join member m on m.member_id = p.member_id where post_id = #{postId}

select p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.created_at, p.hit, p.board_id, p.member_id, m.email, m.nickname, b.board_name from post p inner join member m on p.member_id = m.member_id inner join board b on p.board_id = b.board_id
order by p.created_at desc
order by p.hit desc
limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
